CustomField.description: The account Id of the root. A root account is the primordial account which has all of the children, grandchildren, etc. in the hierarchy. There can be only one root account for a hierarchy. Root > Parent > Leaf
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The account Id of the root. A root account is the primordial account which has all of the children, grandchildren, etc. in the hierarchy. There can be only one root account for a hierarchy. Root > Parent > Leaf
CustomField.label: Account Root
